title: Bug 104630: Column icons don't show up when connecting to a Derby database
description: When connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view, the column icons do not appear as expected.
OB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view, the column icons are not visible.
EB: When connecting to a Derby database in the Data Explorer view, the column icons should be visible.
SR: To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 1. Create a new project. 2. Create a new report. 3. In the Data Explorer view, create a new Data Source with the following details: Driver Class: com.ibm.db2.jcc.DB2Driver Database URL: jdbc:db2://spmdb:1527/gui User Name: root Password: root 4. After setting up the Data Source, create a dataset. 5. In the Edit Dataset window, select Query. 6. [Further steps needed to reproduce the issue].
